=== About Me ===

My name is Luis Michael Ibarra. I've been a Linux user since 2002 and an Ubuntu enthusiast since 2010. I installed Precise once in a lemu4 and never had to reinstall it again. Since that moment I started contributing back to local tech communities in Lima, Peru. 

Currently my research area are containers and Linux networking.
